options.sql:
SELECT
        business_id,
        issuer_name,
        merchant_number,
        date_sub(purchased_up_to, purchase_period) AS limit_date
FROM (
    SELECT
            business_id,
            issuer_name,
            merchant_number,
            COALESCE(calculated_purchase_period, 1) AS purchase_period,
            purchased_up_to
    FROM card_merchants
    JOIN (
            SELECT  issuer AS name,
                    max(date) AS purchased_up_to
            FROM issuer_histories
            WHERE purchases = true AND purchases_checked = true
            GROUP BY issuer
    ) AS issuers
    ON card_merchants.issuer_name = issuers.name
)

SELECT    t.*
FROM      transactions_raw t, credential_keys k, credentials c
WHERE     t.created_at_date >= date_format(add_months(to_date('2021-01-28', 'yyyy-MM-dd'), -1), 'yyyy-MM-01')
AND       date_trunc('month', transacted_at) =  date_trunc('month', to_date('2021-01-28', 'yyyy-MM-dd'))
AND       t.business_id = k.business_id
AND       t.credential_key = k.uuid
AND       k.credential_id = c.id
AND       c.status = 1
AND       (
            (purchased_at is not null AND purchase_canceled_at is null) OR
            (purchased_at is null AND approval_canceled_at is null)
          )

SELECT    t.business_id,
          t.credential_key,
          date_trunc('hour', t.transacted_at) AS time,
          'day_hour' AS time_unit,
          COALESCE(SUM(t.amount), 0) AS card_sales_amount,
          COUNT(*) AS card_sales_count,
          COALESCE(SUM(t.fee), 0) AS card_sales_fee,
          COALESCE(SUM(t.vat_fee), 0) AS card_sales_vat_fee,
          COALESCE(SUM(t.payment), 0) AS card_sales_payment,
          SUM(IF (t.visit_order > 1, t.amount, 0)) AS returning_amount,
          SUM(IF (t.visit_order > 1, 1, 0)) AS returning_count
FROM      transactions t
WHERE     transacted_at BETWEEN '2021-01-28' AND date_format(date_add('2021-01-28', 1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
GROUP BY  1, 2, 3

SELECT    business_id,
          time,
          card_sales_amount,
          card_sales_count,
          card_sales_fee,
          card_sales_vat_fee,
          card_sales_payment,
          returning_amount,
          card_sales_amount - returning_amount AS new_amount
FROM (
        SELECT    t.business_id,
                  t.credential_key,
                  date_trunc('day', t.transacted_at) AS time,
                  'day' AS time_unit,
                  COALESCE(SUM(t.amount), 0) AS card_sales_amount,
                  COUNT(*) AS card_sales_count,
                  COALESCE(SUM(t.fee), 0) AS card_sales_fee,
                  COALESCE(SUM(t.vat_fee), 0) AS card_sales_vat_fee,
                  COALESCE(SUM(t.payment), 0) AS card_sales_payment,
                  SUM(IF (t.visit_order > 1, t.amount, 0)) AS returning_amount,
                  SUM(IF (t.visit_order > 1, 1, 0)) AS returning_count
        FROM      transactions t
        WHERE     transacted_at BETWEEN '2021-01-28' AND date_format(date_add('2021-01-28', 1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
        GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
)

SELECT    business_id,
          time,
          card_sales_amount,
          card_sales_count,
          card_sales_fee,
          card_sales_vat_fee,
          card_sales_payment,
          returning_amount,
          card_sales_amount - returning_amount AS new_amount
FROM (
        SELECT    t.business_id,
                  t.credential_key,
                  date_trunc('month', t.transacted_at) AS time,
                  'month' AS time_unit,
                  COALESCE(SUM(t.amount), 0) AS card_sales_amount,
                  COUNT(*) AS card_sales_count,
                  COALESCE(SUM(t.fee), 0) AS card_sales_fee,
                  COALESCE(SUM(t.vat_fee), 0) AS card_sales_vat_fee,
                  COALESCE(SUM(t.payment), 0) AS card_sales_payment,
                  SUM(IF (t.visit_order > 1, t.amount, 0)) AS returning_amount,
                  SUM(IF (t.visit_order > 1, 1, 0)) AS returning_count
        FROM      transactions t, issuer_purchase_period i
        WHERE     t.business_id = i.business_id
        AND       t.issuer_name = i.issuer_name
        AND       t.merchant_number = i.merchant_number
        AND       (
                      (date_trunc('day', t.transacted_at) > i.limit_date) OR
                      (purchased_at is not null AND purchase_canceled_at is null) OR
                      (approval_canceled_at is not null)
        )
        GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
)

SELECT    nvl(d.business_id, m.business_id) AS business_id,
          nvl(d.time, to_timestamp('2021-01-28', 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AS date,
          m.time AS month,
          d.card_sales_amount,
          d.card_sales_count,
          d.card_sales_fee,
          d.card_sales_vat_fee,
          d.card_sales_payment,
          d.returning_amount,
          d.new_amount,
          m.card_sales_amount AS monthly_card_sales_amount
FROM      daily_card_sales d
FULL OUTER JOIN monthly_card_sales m
ON        d.business_id = m.business_id
AND       date_trunc('month', d.time) = date_trunc('month', m.time)

SELECT      business_id,
              time AS date,
              date_trunc('month', time) AS month,
              collect_set(
                  struct(
                      issuer_name,
                      reserved,
                      received
                  )
              ) as payments
  FROM (
          SELECT  business_id,
                credential_key,
                to_timestamp('2021-01-28', 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS time,
                issuer_name,
                'day' AS time_unit,
                SUM(reserved_amount) AS reserved,
                SUM(received_amount) AS received
          FROM    payments
          WHERE   created_at_date >= '2021-01-28'
          AND     received_at = date_format(date_add('2021-01-28', 1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
          GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 4
  )
  GROUP BY  1, 2

SELECT    *
FROM      delivery_app_orders_stat_raw
WHERE
  (
    time_unit = 'month' AND
    time BETWEEN date_format(to_date('2021-01-28', 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-01') AND date_format(last_day('2021-01-28'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
  )
  OR
  (
    time_unit = 'day' AND
    time BETWEEN '2021-01-28' AND date_format(date_add('2021-01-28', 1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
  )
  OR
  (
    time_unit = 'day_hour' AND
    time BETWEEN '2021-01-28' AND date_format(date_add('2021-01-28', 1), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
  )

SELECT    nvl(d.business_id, m.business_id) AS business_id,
          nvl(d.time, to_timestamp('2021-01-28', 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AS date,
          m.time AS month,
          d.amount_sum,
          d.baemin_online_amount_sum,
          d.yogiyo_online_amount_sum,
          d.baedaltong_online_amount_sum,
          m.baemin_online_amount_sum + m.baedaltong_online_amount_sum + m.yogiyo_online_amount_sum AS monthly_delivery_app_sales_amount
FROM
(
            SELECT    business_id,
                      time,
                      amount_sum,
                      baemin_online_amount_sum,
                      yogiyo_online_amount_sum,
                      baedaltong_online_amount_sum
            FROM      delivery_app_orders_stat
            WHERE     time_unit = 'day'
) AS d
FULL OUTER JOIN   (
            SELECT    business_id,
                      time,
                      amount_sum,
                      baemin_online_amount_sum,
                      yogiyo_online_amount_sum,
                      baedaltong_online_amount_sum
            FROM      delivery_app_orders_stat
            WHERE     time_unit = 'month'
) AS m
ON        d.business_id = m.business_id
AND       date_trunc('month', d.time) = date_trunc('month', m.time)

SELECT    *,
          date_trunc('month', date) AS month
FROM      (
  SELECT    business_id,
            time AS date,
            SUM(IF (hour >= 0 AND hour < 6, amount, 0)) AS 0_6_sales_amount,
            SUM(IF (hour >= 6 AND hour < 11, amount, 0)) AS 6_11_sales_amount,
            SUM(IF (hour >= 11 AND hour < 14, amount, 0)) AS 11_14_sales_amount,
            SUM(IF (hour >= 14 AND hour < 17, amount, 0)) AS 14_17_sales_amount,
            SUM(IF (hour >= 17 AND hour < 24, amount, 0)) AS 17_24_sales_amount
  FROM      (
    SELECT    business_id,
              date_trunc('day', time) AS time,
              hour(time) AS hour,
              card_sales_amount AS amount
    FROM      daily_hour_transactions_stat

    UNION ALL

    SELECT    business_id,
              date_trunc('day', time) AS time,
              hour(time) AS hour,
              (baemin_online_amount_sum + yogiyo_online_amount_sum + baedaltong_online_amount_sum) AS amount
    FROM      delivery_app_orders_stat
    WHERE     time_unit = 'day_hour'
  )
  GROUP BY  1, 2
)

SELECT    *, date_format(date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS date_str
FROM      daily_stat_joined

SELECT      business_id,
              time AS month,
              SUM(amount) AS amount
  FROM      card_purchases_stat
  WHERE     time_unit = 'month'
  AND       time BETWEEN date_format(to_date('2021-01-28', 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-01') AND date_format(last_day('2021-01-28'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
  GROUP BY  business_id, time

SELECT      business_id,
              time AS month,
              hometax_sales_invoices_amount,
              hometax_sales_cash_receipts_amount,
              hometax_purchases_invoices_amount,
              hometax_purchases_cash_receipts_amount
  FROM      hometax_stat
  WHERE     time_unit = 'month'
  AND       time BETWEEN date_format(to_date('2021-01-28', 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-01') AND date_format(last_day('2021-01-28'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')

SELECT
      business_id,
      card_sales_amount,
      card_sales_count,
      card_sales_fee,
      card_sales_vat_fee,
      card_sales_payment,
      card_sales_new_amount,
      card_sales_returning_amount,
      card_sales_monthly_amount,
      hourly_sales_0_6_amount,
      hourly_sales_6_11_amount,
      hourly_sales_11_14_amount,
      hourly_sales_14_17_amount,
      hourly_sales_17_24_amount,
      delivery_app_sales_baemin_amount,
      delivery_app_sales_yogiyo_amount,
      delivery_app_sales_baedaltong_amount,
      delivery_app_sales_monthly_amount,
      card_purchases_monthly_amount,
      hometax_sales_monthly_invoice_amount,
      hometax_sales_monthly_cash_amount,
      hometax_purchases_monthly_cash_amount,
      hometax_purchases_monthly_invoice_amount,

      card_payments_map.`KB` AS today_payments_kb,
      card_payments_map.`농협NH` AS today_payments_nh,
      card_payments_map.`롯데` AS today_payments_lotte,
      card_payments_map.`배달의민족` AS today_payments_baemin,
      card_payments_map.`비씨` AS today_payments_bc,
      card_payments_map.`삼성` AS today_payments_samsung,
      card_payments_map.`신한` AS today_payments_shinhan,
      card_payments_map.`하나` AS today_payments_hana,
      card_payments_map.`현대` AS today_payments_hyundai,
      card_payments_map.`요기요` AS today_payments_yogiyo,
      card_payments_map.`배달통` AS today_payments_baedaltong
FROM (
   SELECT
           CAST(business_id AS LONG) AS business_id,
           daily_stat.card_sales.card_sales_amount AS card_sales_amount,
           daily_stat.card_sales.card_sales_count AS card_sales_count,
           daily_stat.card_sales.card_sales_fee AS card_sales_fee,
           daily_stat.card_sales.card_sales_vat_fee AS card_sales_vat_fee,
           daily_stat.card_sales.card_sales_payment AS card_sales_payment,
           daily_stat.card_sales.returning_amount AS card_sales_returning_amount,
           daily_stat.card_sales.new_amount AS card_sales_new_amount,
           daily_stat.card_sales.monthly_card_sales_amount AS card_sales_monthly_amount,
           daily_stat.hourly_sales.0_6_sales_amount AS hourly_sales_0_6_amount,
           daily_stat.hourly_sales.6_11_sales_amount AS hourly_sales_6_11_amount,
           daily_stat.hourly_sales.11_14_sales_amount AS hourly_sales_11_14_amount,
           daily_stat.hourly_sales.14_17_sales_amount AS hourly_sales_14_17_amount,
           daily_stat.hourly_sales.17_24_sales_amount AS hourly_sales_17_24_amount,
           daily_stat.delivery_app_sales.baemin_online_amount_sum AS delivery_app_sales_baemin_amount,
           daily_stat.delivery_app_sales.yogiyo_online_amount_sum AS delivery_app_sales_yogiyo_amount,
           daily_stat.delivery_app_sales.baedaltong_online_amount_sum AS delivery_app_sales_baedaltong_amount,
           daily_stat.delivery_app_sales.monthly_delivery_app_sales_amount AS delivery_app_sales_monthly_amount,

           monthly_card_purchases.amount AS card_purchases_monthly_amount,

           monthly_hometax.hometax_sales_invoices_amount AS hometax_sales_monthly_invoice_amount,
           monthly_hometax.hometax_sales_cash_receipts_amount AS hometax_sales_monthly_cash_amount,
           monthly_hometax.hometax_purchases_invoices_amount AS hometax_purchases_monthly_invoice_amount,
           monthly_hometax.hometax_purchases_cash_receipts_amount AS hometax_purchases_monthly_cash_amount,

           map_from_entries(transform(daily_stat.card_payments.payments, m -> named_struct('issuer', m.issuer_name, 'amount', nvl(m.received, 0)))) AS card_payments_map

    FROM    merged_stat
)
